response.overview: Noah Calhoun lives with his wife, Allie, in a retirement home. Allie is suffering from Alzheimer's and struggles to remember her husband and life ("Time"). Noah reads a love story to Allie from a notebook â€“ the story of the two of them, around when they were seventeen and during a period about ten years later.
response.tagline: If this is love, I'm not ready
response.title: The Notebook: The Musical
